name: Complete Google Search Font Fix
description: Revert the large text change for google's searches so you can continue to search at a better efficiency as you've always done before. Added changes for the new google layout, as well as compatibility for https://greasyfork.org/en/scripts/395257-better-google to restore google to it's original look.
additional_info: Added support for other google domains like google.fr, for example. Added further support, sorry for it not affecting sites like google.co.uk Added changes for the new google layout, as well as compatibility for https://greasyfork.org/en/scripts/395257-better-google to restore google to it's original look. Try https://greasyfork.org/en/scripts/411886-better-google-updated if the previous script doesn't work.

discussions.name: Last update from Google added icons and new design for url... Can you remove all these stuff??
